name: UPI Chem - PHYTOSTEROL 95 MIN
description: UPI Chem supplies high-purity PHYTOSTEROL 95 MIN (95% minimum purity) for barrier repair and anti-inflammatory applications. Plant-derived sterols provide exceptional quality and efficacy in cosmetic formulations. Phytosterols mimic cholesterol's barrier-supporting function while offering anti-inflammatory and moisturizing benefits.
notes: CAS 83-46-5. High-purity compound (95% minimum) ensures efficacy. Plant-derived sterols provide exceptional quality in cosmetic formulations. Anti-inflammatory and moisturizing properties complement barrier repair function. Cholesterol alternative for vegan and plant-based formulations.
